project_descr: Improving Energy Efficiency in Indian Railways(IR) system by wide adoption of energy efficiency technologies and measures in the IR system

outputs.output_descr: The project aims at improving energy efficiency (EE) in the Indian Railways system (and thereby reducing GHG emissions) by removing some of the key barriers that prevent the wide adoption of energy efficiency technologies and measures in the IR system.

project_title: improving energy efficiency in indian railways system
